Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class ServerUtilities

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ServerUtilities
public class ServerUtilities extends Object
Eager singleton class fundamental for synchronizing the threads that control the clients communication and the game logic

  • Method Details

    • serverCall

      public static ServerUtilities serverCall()
      Static method to obtain the instance of the ServerUtilities singleton
      Returns:
      the instance of the ServerUtilities singleton

    • addNewPlayer

      public boolean addNewPlayer​(String nickname, PlayerHandler client) throws ReconnectionException
      Adds a new player to the global list of active Players, this list can be useful for searching existing nicknames or other things
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player you want to add to the global list
      client - the PlayerHandler related to the new client to add in the global list
      Returns:
      true if there wasn't a previous player with the same nickname in this list false if there is already a player with that name in the list and is connected
      Throws:
      ReconnectionException - if there is already a player with that name in the list but he is currently disconnected

    • pingAll

      public void pingAll()
      Keeps alive every connection with a connected client -> this method should be called periodically

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer​(PlayerHandler removedClient)
      Removes a player from the global list of active Players, this list can be useful for searching existing nicknames or other things
      Parameters:
      removedClient - the client to remove from the global list
      Returns:
      true if the PlayerHandler was previously in the global list false if there are no such PlayerHandler in the global list

    • findControlBase

      public ControlBase findControlBase​(String nickname)
      Returns the controlBase of the required player, if the player is actually disconnected, returns null
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player you want to know the relative controlBase
      Returns:
      the control base of the player required, or null if the player is disconnected, if a player with that nickname is not present in the server returns null as well

    • reconnection

      public boolean reconnection​(PlayerHandler newClient, String nickname)
      Associates the newClient with the nickname of the previously disconnected player, set the previous matchController and send to him the summary of the match
      Parameters:
      newClient - the client who wants to continue the match of the previously disconnected player
      nickname - the nickname of the previously disconnected player
      Returns:
      true if the reconnection worked, false if there isn't a player with that nickname in the server or the player is already connected

    • canCreateMatch

      public boolean canCreateMatch​(Player host)
      If returns true, the player host has reserved the right for creating the next match. Returns false if someone is already searching for players in his match, in that case try to add the player to the current match and set the client in waiting. If there is a pendent match no one can ask for opponents until the previous request is not filled.
      Returns:
      false if someone is already searching for players in his match, you can't form your own true if you can create your own match, and so reserve the place, you will be the next who can ask for players

    • rejectPriority

      public boolean rejectPriority​(Player host)
      If the method is called by the previous host give the possibility to create the next match to the next player in list
      Parameters:
      host - the player who want to reject his priority
      Returns:
      true if the host had the priority before

    • searchingForPlayers

      public void searchingForPlayers​(Player submitter, int numPlayers)
      Create a new waiting list for players to join a new match, the submitter has to be inserted inside a canCreateMatch(Player) before and the method should had returned true
      Parameters:
      submitter - the player who wants to create the new match
      numPlayers - the number of players who have to participate in the new match

    • removeFromWaitingList

      public boolean removeFromWaitingList​(Player player)
      Removes the player from the waiting list if he was present
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is disconnecting
      Returns:
      true if the player was present in the waiting list

    • matchParticipants

      public List<Player> matchParticipants()
      Returns the list of players who joins the match and empty the waiting queue, now someone else can create is own match. This method is automatically called when a waiting list is full and so doesn't need to wait for filling the queue
      Returns:
      the list of players who joins the match
